title: Kinetics of the reactions of the Criegee intermediate CH2OO with water vapour: experimental measurements as a function of temperature and global atmospheric modelling
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00097H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rachel E. Lade, Mark A. Blitz, Matthew Rowlinson, Mathew J. Evans, Paul W. Seakins, Daniel Stone
The kinetics of reactions between the Criegee intermediate, CH2OO, and water vapour have been investigated between 262 and 353 K at 760 Torr using laser flash photolysis of CH2I2–O2–N2–H2O with broadband time-resolved UV absorption spectroscopy.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
